data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 2,881 believers in the state of Al Ḥasakah to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Ḥasakah, Syria
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Al Ḥasakah to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

data.prayer: Father, see the suffering of your people in the state of Al Ḥasakah. Deliver all those who have not forgotten your Word.
data.verse: Look on my suffering and deliver me, for I have not forgotten your law.

data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Al Ḥasakah, Syria by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Kurd, Kurmanji people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Kurd, Kurmanji people know you.
Father, you know every soul, and you know who are yours and who are yet to be yours out of the 1,512,000 people living in Al Ḥasakah, Syria. Please, call your lost sheep to yourself.
data.verse: For I will take you out of the nations; I will gather you from all the countries and bring you back into your own land.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Al Ḥasakah with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Ḥasakah, Syria has a population of 1,512,000.

We estimate Al Ḥasakah has 2,881 people who might know Jesus, 83,613 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,425,506 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 524 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Al Ḥasakah, Syria that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.
